name: Childhood Game - Fly
description:
A game I made when I was first creating video games in Gamemaker 8 back in the day. Used to be up on the YoYoGames sandbox.

I found it in my files recently (among a bunch of other old games I made), and thought some other devs might get a kick out of seeing an old project like this.

The premise is you travel to different worlds and battle bosses to defeat the evil snowman who created a giant vortex to destroy the world

Controls:

  • Left/Right - move left/right
  • Z - jump
  • X - attack
